room_title: Escape room "Crazy Christmas Heist" by Intrigue Escape Games in Mt Pleasant
room_address: 316 N Mission St Mt Pleasant, MI 48858
room_description: Someone has stolen Santa’s “Naughty or Nice” lists and he needs YOU to help figure out who did it, and recover the lists! A special elf informant has hidden clues (puzzles) in Santa’s workshop. Do those stuffed animals have secrets to tell? Can plastic army men help point the way to the criminal? Can game pieces magically unlock a clue? This game is wall-to-wall Christmas FUN! Our “Crazy Christmas Heist” escape room is unique because not only do you solve puzzles, but you actually have to use your detective skills to figure out “who done it?”. This 60-minute adventure features puzzles based around Christmas toys! What’s more fun than that? Enjoy Christmas magic at any time of year!
